name: FluidStateHelper
description: The FluidStateHelper class provides a comprehensive interface for working with fluid states in Minecraft through JSMacros scripts.
overview:
The FluidStateHelper class provides a comprehensive interface for working with fluid states in Minecraft through JSMacros scripts. This class allows you to inspect and manipulate fluid properties, check fluid behavior, and retrieve various attributes about fluid states in the world.

Fluid states represent different fluids (water, lava, etc.) and their properties at specific block positions. This helper class extends StateHelper and provides access to all fluid-specific functionality.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the fluid in the format minecraft:fluid_name.

methods.name: isStill
methods.description: Returns true if the fluid is in a still state, false if it's flowing.

methods.name: isEmpty
methods.description: Returns true if this fluid state is empty (represents the default fluid state for non-fluid blocks), false otherwise.

methods.name: getHeight
methods.description: Returns the height of this fluid state. This is useful for determining the fluid level in a block.

methods.name: getLevel
methods.description: Returns the fluid level as an integer value. Higher values typically mean more fluid.

methods.name: hasRandomTicks
methods.description: Returns true if the fluid has random tick logic (currently only used by lava for fire spreading), false otherwise.

methods.name: getVelocity
methods.description: Returns the velocity vector that will be applied to entities at the given position due to fluid flow.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: The position in the world to calculate velocity for

methods.name: getBlockState
methods.description: Returns the block state associated with this fluid state.

methods.name: getBlastResistance
methods.description: Returns the blast resistance value of this fluid.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Returns a map of all state properties with their identifiers and values.

methods.name: with
methods.description: Creates a new fluid state with the specified property modified. Note that this returns a new instance and doesn't modify the original.

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: The name of the property to modify

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The new value for the property

methods.name: getRaw
methods.description: Returns the underlying Minecraft FluidState object for advanced usage.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Compares this fluid state helper with another object for equality.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns the hash code for this fluid state helper.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the fluid state in JSON format showing the fluid ID and properties.
